title: partnership @ScottWalter - Inhouse - V - MI - UGC -  preventative botox - story telling - 8698aa11w - 28/03/25 v2
description:
As a dermatologist, I often get asked about the best ways to prevent fine lines and wrinkles. While Botox is a common option, it‚Äôs not the only solution‚Äînor is it the right choice for everyone.

That‚Äôs why I‚Äôm recommend Qure‚Äôs Micro-Infusion System, an innovative, at-home treatment designed to enhance skin health and visibly slow the signs of aging.

It uses 24K gold-plated microneedles to create microchannels in the skin, delivering targeted anti-aging ingredients deep into the epidermis for optimal absorption and effectiveness. In just a quick 5-minute session every two weeks, this system helps:

‚úî Smooth fine lines and refine skin texture

‚úî Improve hydration and plumpness for a more youthful appearance

‚úî Provide a minimally invasive, at-home alternative to in-office treatments

Whether you‚Äôre considering preventative Botox or simply looking for an effective skincare approach, Qure‚Äôs Micro-Infusion System offers a professional-grade solution‚Äîwithout the need for frequent clinic visits.

See the results for yourself‚Äînow available at 50% off for a limited time.
https://www.qureskincare.com/pages/qure-microinfusion-offer

title: Q - Dr. Alex v4 micro (no caption) - recommend copy - plump h - needels th - Copy 6
description:
I normally would not recommend at home micro-needling since the needles don‚Äôt have an effective way of being cleaned...

‚òëÔ∏è but these needles in Qure's micro-infusion system are sterile and for one-time use only, safe to use, have minimal down time, and is effective! 

Micro-needling is extremely effective for acne scaring, hyperpigmentation, and increasing product absorption. 

Micro-needling office treatments will be ‚Äústronger‚Äù and the results will be quicker but that‚Äôs not always an option for everyone as they can be expensive. 

However, this at-home infusion device is a fraction of the cost, safe to use, has minimal downtime and is effective! It makes skin care more attainable to everyone not just those with access to doctors and specialists!

üí∞ For less than $25 a treatment (as opposed to $300+ per office treatment) I think this at-home treatment with repeated use can definitely give you meaningful and lasting results!

üôå  I love that the downtime was just 15 minutes for me, that I don‚Äôt have to make an appointment, and can work around my schedule! 

üåü I personally think my products absorbed better, my skin looks a bit brighter, and that larger acne scar on my right cheek has started to fade after just TWO treatments!

SAFETY TIPS: make sure your hands are clean, do not use each needle head more than once, don‚Äôt drag the needles (it‚Äôs a stamping device), don‚Äôt use overactive breakouts, and consult your dermatologist before use if you have sensitive skin or specific skin conditions. 

üõíüõç get in quick as they have sold out 3x already

Click the link below now to SAVE 43% with their limited-time offer üëá

Qure‚Äôs Micro-Infusion System is an investment in your skin's future.

By triggering your skins natural healing process to regenerate and infusing potent serums, Qure helps improve skin texture, reduce fine lines, and promote a brighter complexion over time. It's not a quick fix; it's a lasting improvement.

With continued use, you‚Äôll see:

‚úÖ Less visible fine lines & wrinkles 
‚úÖ More smooth and even looking skin tone 
‚úÖ Hydrated and brighter looking skin 

Why should you consider Micro-Infusion?

- Long-Term Skin Rejuvenation: Improves skin health from within, not just a surface-level treatment.

‚òëÔ∏è but these needles in Qure's micro-infusion system are sterile and for one-time use only, safe to use, have minimal down time, and is effective! 

Micro-needling helps reduce acne scaring, hyperpigmentation, and increasing product absorption. 

Micro-needling office treatments will be ‚Äústronger‚Äù and the results will be quicker but that‚Äôs not always an option for everyone as they can be expensive. 

However, this at-home infusion device is a fraction of the cost, safe to use, has minimal downtime and is effective! 

It makes skin care more attainable to everyone not just those with access to doctors and specialists!

üí∞ For less than $25 a treatment (as opposed to $300+ per office treatment) I think this at-home treatment with repeated use can definitely give you meaningful and lasting results!

üôå  I love that the downtime was just 15 minutes for me, that I don‚Äôt have to make an appointment, and can work around my schedule! 

üåü I personally think my products absorbed better, my skin looks a bit brighter!

SAFETY TIPS: make sure your hands are clean, do not use each needle head more than once, don‚Äôt drag the needles (it‚Äôs a stamping device), don‚Äôt use overactive breakouts, and consult your dermatologist before use if you have sensitive skin or specific skin conditions. 

üõíüõç get in quick as they have sold out 3x already
